endemics.video_reference: Source: <a href='https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=5786&snA=158908'> 環境生物整理<a>，Thanks jimmerican55(馬雲巴巴) for providing video.

great_izuchi.description: The alpha Izuchi of its pack, identified by its larger build, upended white fur and scythe-like tail. A Great Izuchi forms a herd of many smaller Izuchi and selects two from the group to accompany it on territory patrols. Once it spots prey or senses danger, the Great Izuchi issues commands to their fellow Izuchi, and coordinates their movements. Take care that you don't get overwhelmed.

arzuros.description: Beasts known to dwell in humid forests and mountain regions. Though known more for fishing and standing upright to collect honey, their thick claws and heavy forearm plating allow them to deliver powerful blows to any aggressor.

rathian.description: Fire-breathing female wyverns, also known as the 'Queens of the Land.' With powerful legs and poison-secreting tails, they hunt mainly on the ground. Sometimes seen preying as a couple, Rathian and Rathalos cooperate well.

mizutsune.description: Mizutsune can secrete a peculiar foam that allows it to slide along the ground as it attacks its prey. It is as graceful as it is deadly.

tetranadon.description: An Amphibian easily recognized by its gigantic, rotund body. It is extremely gluttonous and swallows everything that moves whole, gravel and all. Once it's done eating, its stomach swells and it becomes slower, but its attacks also become heavier and much more destructive.

aknosom.description: When this huge Bird Wyvern stands on one leg, its peculiar collar gives it the appearance of a monstrous parasol. It is fiercely territorial, and whenever it finds intruders, it spreads its wings and unfolds the eye-like crest on its head to terrifying effect.

somnacanth.description: A formidable aquatic serpent that crests on moonlit nights—likely why it has often been mistaken for a mermaid. Despite its appearance, it is extremely aggressive, and tolerates no trespassers on its turf. It expels an intoxicating sleep powder from an organ on its neck, knocking out prey before it can resist.

khezu.description: The creepy Flying Wyvern returns to once again strike fear into the hearts of many a hunter. Its long, elastic neck stretching out while it clings to a wall or the ceiling is a sight straight out of a nightmare. Make sure you do not get overwhelmed by its horrific appearance.

royal_ludroth.description: A larger male form of the regular Ludroth. Royal Ludroth use their sponge-like mane to absorb water and keep from drying out on land. Once the sponge loses moisture, they will seek out water to recover. They also spew mucus to trip up their prey.

rathalos.description: The biggest representative of the Monster Hunter series. It descends on invaders from the sky, attacking with poison claws. Be especially careful of its fiery breath!

pukei-pukei.description: A flying wyvern known to possess poisonous toxins in its body. It's been spotted storing scatternuts in its mouth or tail, coating them with poison and spitting them out at threats.

kulu-ya-ku.description: An odd Bird Wyvern that has developed limbs capable of carrying weapons. It's been spotted stealing eggs from nests found in the Ancient Forest and Wildspire Waste. (Description from MHW)

tobi-kadachi.description: A Fanged Wyvern that flies among the trees of the Ancient Forest. Its penchant to brush against the ground and the trees as it moves around builds up static electricity within its fur. (Description from MHW)

anjanath.description: The Anjanath patrols the Ancient Forest looking for its favorite meal, Aptonoth. This belligerent monster will attack anything without the slightest provocation. (Description from MHW)

jyuratodus.description: A large Piscine Wyvern that inhabits the swamps of the Wildspire Waste. It uses mud to capture prey, and it's known to battle other monsters over territory. (Description from MHW)

great_wroggi.description: A larger form of the regular Wroggi. Wroggi are bird wyverns that travel in packs that are led by the largest and most toxic member. Be careful when one raises its head and its poison sac expands—that signals that it's about to spit a cloud of poisonous mist.

bishaten.description: A monster with a distinctive tail. While it is omnivorous, it has a preference for fruit, and keeps various fruits with all kinds of effects in its belly pouch. An incredibly curious beast, it enjoys playing tricks on people, and has been seen to bat fruit at its prey using its tail.

magnamalo.description: Magnamalo is the flagship monster of Monster Hunter Rise (MHRise). Its face exudes a fearsome malice, and its hide is as tough as armor, as if it were the physical manifestation of the grudges of fallen warriors. The purple gas that rises from its body when it eats other monsters is called 'Hellfire', and it makes Magnamalo's already ferocious attacks even more destructive.

goss_harag.description: A Fanged Beast roaming snowy plains in search of prey. Its body is covered in fur so thick it keeps out the harsh frost. It can inhale the cold air to freeze its own bodily fluids and then spit them out to create icy blades on its arms. When riled up, it turns red and becomes exceedingly dangerous.

great_baggi.description: The crafty Bird Wyvern returns with it characteristic ability to stun prey with a tranquilizing fluid. Noted for its projecting cranial crests and bluish-white skin that's adapted to snowy climates. It craftily commands other Baggi to surround their prey before instigating an all-out attack.

lagombi.description: Lagombi returns after his most recent appearance in Monster Hunter Generations. A fanged beast whose warm pelt and thick layers of fat help it survive in cold climates. It has exceptional hearing as well. It can glide swiftly on ice to sneak up on prey.

barioth.description: The Wyvern that rules the eternally frozen tundra is back again with freshly-sharpened fangs. It uses its forelegs, tail and spiked scales to traverse the slippery ice with ease.

tigrex.description: A Flying Wyvern whose primitive origins are obvious. It displays incredible ferocity with its claws, jaws, and developed limbs. Be wary of its thunderous roar!

vigorwasp.name: Vigorwasp
vigorwasp.description: An insect that collects a restorative nectar andstores it in a sac. When struck, the sac releasesa healing mist that's sure to be useful for huntersin a pinch.

paratoad.name: Paratoad
paratoad.description: A large toad with a distinct yellow body.It stores a paralyzing gas that, when emitted,is powerful enough to incapacitate evenlarge monsters. Kamura hunters are quitefamiliar with this creature as they are oftenutilized for traps.

sleeptoad.name: Sleeptoad
sleeptoad.description: A large toad with a distinct blue body.It stores a soporific gas that, when emitted,is powerful enough to knock out even largemonsters. Using it in conjunction witha Bomb Barrel on a sleeping monster makesfor a powerful all-out attack, provided you getthe timing right.

blastoad.name: Blastoad
blastoad.description: A large toad with a distinct red body.It stores an explosive gas that, when emittedand mixed with the air, can cause an explosionpowerful enough to topple even largemonsters.

poisontoad.name: Poisontoad
poisontoad.description: A large toad with a distinct purple body.It stores a poisonous gas that, when emitted,is powerful enough to instantly poison anythingthat it comes in contact with, even large monsters.

lanternbug.name: Lanternbug
lanternbug.description: A glowing caterpillar that secretes a stickyfluid to attach leaves or wood to its body,making it look larger. This body fluid ishighly volatile, and applying shock to itwill cause it to explode in self-defense.When worn, it detonates when struck,mitigating some damage to the wearer.

aurortle.name: Aurortle
aurortle.description: A large tortoise with an anthill on its back.If you capture it, the anthill absorbs damagefor you when you take a fatal blow. Aurortlesand the ants that reside in the anthill havea symbiotic relationship where the antsprotect the shell with their hill, in exchangefor the tortoise's food scraps and excrement.

clothfly.name: Clothfly
clothfly.description: A butterfly with long wings. In flight, it lookslike a flowing piece of cloth, giving it its name.When struck, it scatters a dust cloud andflees. The dust has a tightening effect onhuman skin making it more resistant toinjury.

antidobra.name: Antidobra
antidobra.description: A snake with an unusually developedneck region. Its body is filled with anantidote that works on various poisons.When a hunter absorbs it, ailments arehealed, and resistance is heightenedtemporarily. The pattern on the back ofits head resembles a scary human face.Despite its size, it has a timid nature.

wirebug.name: Wirebug
wirebug.description: A beetle native to the Kamura area. The term Wirebuggenerally refers to the females of the species. It iscapable of producing a super-strong silk colloquiallyknown as Ironsilk, which it uses to carry materials tobuild its nest. For ages, the villagers of Kamurahave trained Wirebugs to make use of their mobility.It's skittish when feral, but quite obedient oncetrained. Loves Jewel Lilies.

red_spiribird.name: Red Spiribird
red_spiribird.description: A small bird that glows a faint red. This glowcomes from pollen that accumulates on itsbody while drinking nectar. Many mistakethis glow for a human soul, hence the name.Petalaces become fragrant and gain anattack boost when imbued with this pollen.

orange_spiribird.name: Orange Spiribird
orange_spiribird.description: A small bird that glows a faint orange. Thisglow comes from pollen that accumulateson its body while drinking nectar. Manymistake this glow for a human soul, hencethe name. Petalaces become fragrant andgain a defense boost when imbued withthis pollen.

green_spiribird.name: Green Spiribird
green_spiribird.description: A small bird that glows a faint green. Thisglow comes from pollen that accumulateson its body while drinking nectar. Manymistake this glow for a human soul, hencethe name. Petalaces become fragrant andgain a health boost when imbued with thispollen.

yellow_spiribird.name: Yellow Spiribird
yellow_spiribird.description: A small bird that glows a faint yellow. Thisglow comes from pollen that accumulateson its body while drinking nectar. Manymistake this glow for a human soul, hencethe name. Petalaces become fragrant andgain a stamina boost when imbued withthis pollen.

prism_spiribird.name: Prism Spiribird
prism_spiribird.description: A small bird that glows a spectrum of colors.This glow comes from pollen that accumulateson its body while drinking nectar. Many mistakethis glow for a human soul, hence the name.Petalaces become fragrant and gain maximizedabilities when imbued with this pollen.

mudbeetle.name: Mudbeetle
mudbeetle.description: A tiny beetle that pushes around a mud ballwith its hind legs. The mud ball has waterproperties, and throwing it at a target willinflict it with waterblight. The water elementmakes the mud ball seem wet all the time.

thunderbeetle.name: Thunderbeetle
thunderbeetle.description: A tiny beetle that pushes around a dirt ballwith its hind legs. The dirt ball has thunderproperties, and throwing it at a target willinflict it with thunderblight. No one seemsto understand why the dirt ball has theseproperties.

snowbeetle.name: Snowbeetle
snowbeetle.description: A tiny beetle that pushes around a snowballwith its hind legs. The snowball has ice proper-ties, and throwing it at a target will inflict it withiceblight. The snowballs are so cold that you'llget frostbite if you hold them for too long.

firebeetle.name: Firebeetle
firebeetle.description: A tiny beetle that pushes around a lavarock with its hind legs. The lava rock itpushes has fire properties, and throwingit at a target will inflict it with fireblight.The lava rocks may feel warm to hold,but hold them too long and you mayget burned.

flashfly.name: Flashfly
flashfly.description: Winged insects that emit a bright light when struck.To survive, Flashflies live together in a swarm andhave a defense mechanism that allows them to emita blinding flash if threatened, giving them time toflee to safety. The flash is so bright that it's possibleto cause a large monster to flinch. Once the threathas disappeared the swarm will gather together again.

rock_lizard.name: Rock Lizard
rock_lizard.description: A small lizard that lives in various locales. Toprotect itself from predators, Rock Lizards willattach minerals to their body in order to blendin with their surroundings. If attacked, they willshed these minerals and escape. They arepopular among hunters as the mineralshave many uses.

boulder_lizard.name: Boulder Lizard
boulder_lizard.description: A relative of the Rock Lizard, these lizardscan also be found in a number of locales.And like the Rock Lizard, it also attachesa variety of minerals to its body to protectitself. However, these minerals are typicallyharder than those found on Rock Lizardsand are more sought after by hunters.

scale_lizard.name: Scale Lizard
scale_lizard.description: Relatives of the Rock Lizard, these lizards canalso be found in a number of locales. Unlike theRock Lizard, they don't attach minerals to theirbodiesâ€”instead, they tend to use monster scalesand claws. Scale Lizards are extremely rare asthey inhabit areas seldom traveled. They areprized by hunters as the materials they dropfetch a high price.

stinkmink.name: Stinkmink
stinkmink.description: A weasel with distinct snow-white fur that islight and warm. When threatened, it emitsa type of pheromone from the scent glandsnear the base of its tail in the form of a smoke-like cloud. It uses its tail to spread the cloudin an attempt to attract any monster nearby.If a monster is successfully lured to itslocation, it'll use this chance to escape.

escuregot.name: Escuregot
escuregot.description: A large snail with a green shell. It stores fluidswith healing properties in its body, consuming themwhen food is scarce. When attacked, it emits a typeof mist from its shell to blind its attacker. Immuneto the mist's blinding effects, they are often usedby hunters out in the field as a means to heal.

puppet_spider.name: Puppet Spider
puppet_spider.description: A spider with a distinct yellow-spotted pattern.It shoots out a sticky web from its abdomenthat is robust enough to restrain monsters.When feeding or fleeing from enemies, it usesstrings of web to immobilize its target. Whenfeeding in particular, this behavior is reminiscentof a puppeteer manipulating a marionette, whichis how its name came about.

wailnard.name: Wailnard
wailnard.description: A pheasant with a giant red vocal sac.It sounds like a crying child, which it usesto attract large monsters that will, in turn,distract its predators. Hunters capture and useWailnards to lure large monsters to their vicinity.It is a usually docile creature that spends mostof its time in hiding. Despite its wings, it's notvery good at flying.

great_wirebug.name: Great Wirebug
great_wirebug.description: A beetle native to the Kamura area. This namerefers to male Wirebugs, so called for their larger,more powerful bodies. As they are stronger thanfemale Wirebugs, they are often used for long-distance movement, though they are less nimbleand harder to control. They are also far lesscommon than females. Once placed in a patchof Jewel Lilies, it'll never leave.

butterflame.name: Butterflame
butterflame.description: A butterfly with crimson wings. In flight,they look like dancing flames and in thepast, were often mistaken for fire or ghosts.When attacked, they release a type of dustbefore fleeing. This dust can temporarily boostattack strength if inhaled.

peepersects.name: Peepersects
peepersects.description: A butterfly with spotted yellow wings thatcan be found living in swarms in variouslocales across the region. In the past theywere mistaken for flying eyeballs hence theircreepy name. When attacked, they releasea type of dust before fleeing. This dust cantemporarily boost stamina if inhaled.

golden_spiribug.name: Golden Spiribug
golden_spiribug.description: A golden beetle. When in flight, the sound of itswings flapping has a relaxing effect. Its diet mostlyconsists of other tiny insects. The ones that it favorsmost can be found on the plants that Petalaces aremade from. Hunters wearing a Petalace will attractGolden Spiribugs and often return from hunts withtheir Petalace covered in them. A dye made fromthis bug is a famous specialty of Kamura Village.

gilded_spiribug.name: Gilded Spiribug
gilded_spiribug.description: A gold beetle related to Golden Spiribugs. Thesound of its wings flapping has a relaxing effect.Its diet mostly consists of the tiny insects thatfeed on the plants that Petalaces are made from.Hunters wearing a Petalace will attract GildedSpiribugs and often return from hunts with theirPetalace covered in them. A dye made fromthis bug is a famous specialty of Kamura Village.

giganha.name: Giganha
giganha.description: Carnivorous fish native to the Flooded Forest.Though usually docile, they'll go into a frenzywhen they smell meat. Giganha will attemptto sink their teeth into anything, monstersand hunters alike. Their ravenous behaviorsubsides once they have had their fill, butwill return when hunger sets in.

red_lampsquid.name: Red Lampsquid
red_lampsquid.description: A squid that inhabits the Frost Islands,swimming in schools and spitting ink at threats.It emits a phosphorescence the same color asits ink, and can be sighted lighting up the seaslike an underwater lamp, hence its name. Red Lampsquid ink temporarily increasesconcentration, granting the consumer ahigher chance of landing critical strikes.

yellow_lampsquid.name: Yellow Lampsquid
yellow_lampsquid.description: A squid that inhabits the Frost Islands,swimming in schools and spitting ink at threats.It emits a phosphorescence the same color asits ink, and can be sighted lighting up the seaslike an underwater lamp, hence its name. YellowLampsquid ink temporarily dulls the nerves,making the consumer more resistant to pain.

green_lampsquid.name: Green Lampsquid
green_lampsquid.description: A squid that inhabits the Frost Islands,swimming in schools and spitting ink at threats.It emits a phosphorescence the same color asits ink, and can be sighted lighting up the seaslike an underwater lamp, hence its name. GreenLampsquid ink has curative properties, healinginjuries and wounds to an extent.

golden_lampsquid.name: Golden Lampsquid
golden_lampsquid.description: A squid that inhabits the Frost Islands.Unlike other Lampsquid, it swims alone. It owesits aureate glow to its ink, which is known topromote concentration, fortitude, and the healingof any and all wounds. It is so rare that it hasearned the name "King of the Lampsquid."

pincercrab.name: Pincercrab
pincercrab.description: A hermit crab native to the Sandy Plains.It sticks to cliffs in small groups and eatsplants and smaller creatures there, dirt andall. The consumed dirt accumulates in theshell and is excreted when it's large enough.When attacked, the group goes into highalert, shooting lumps of earth at their attacker.

echobat.name: Echobat
echobat.description: Bats found in Lava Caverns. They live in groupsand eat small flying bugs. Highly territorial, theywill threaten invaders by turning themselves redand releasing scales that act like gunpowder tocause explosions large enough to hurt even largemonsters.

snow-faced_fox.name: Snow-faced Fox
snow-faced_fox.description: A fox that inhabits the Shrine Ruins. Extremelyrare, it has been seen perched atop the gate leadinginto the Ruins. Its large bushy tail has a unique patternthat gives off the impression that it's split into nineseparate parts, but in reality, it's just one large tail.Despite its majestic appearance, it's quite a playfulcreature.

quetzalcobra.name: Quetzalcobra
quetzalcobra.description: A rare snake that inhabits the Flooded Forest.It can fan out its neck, appearing like the wingsof a bird, in a display used to threaten predatorsor attract mates. It secretes a fluid from its mouththat has healing properties. It used to be worshippedby humans, but this practice has disappeared overtime, and now it just lives its enigmatic life free ofall the fuss.

monksnail.name: Monksnail
monksnail.description: A gigantic sea snail from the Frost Islands.It hates bright lights, and so remains inthe sea during the day. At night, it surfaceswhere squids and other such potential preygather. It possesses an organ that projectsvarious patterns of light onto its skin.Its eyeball-like glow and colossal silhouetteare the dread of every sailor in the region.

regitrice.name: Regitrice
regitrice.description: A rare wingdrake of the Sandy Plains. It usuallynests in caves, but will occasionally emergeto bask in the sun, improving its metabolism.On its head is a comb that looks like a wingedcrown or cape, which, combined with its glitteringscales and languid form, gives it something of aregal air.

hellbill.name: Hellbill
hellbill.description: A rare bird found near the crater of the LavaCaverns. Its vibrant red feathers grant it immunityto the dangers of magma. It bathes in lava to burnoff germs and metabolic waste. This spectaclehas resulted in it becoming a symbol of rebirthamong mankind.

fortune_owl.name: Fortune Owl
fortune_owl.description: An auspicious owl of this region, with goldenfeathers on its chest and a cat-like face. Dueto its extreme rarity, it has been a symbol ofwealth since ancient times. Those who encounterit are said to come into great fortune.

felicicrow.name: Felicicrow
felicicrow.description: A large crow with beautiful blue and black feathers.It possesses a lavish white collar and tail feathersso highly developed that it's able to use them as athird leg. It is said those who can snatch a twigfrom its beak will come into great fortune.

trapbugs.name: Trapbugs
trapbugs.description: Insects with sharp horns that live in coloniesaffixed to tree branches. If attacked, their hornswill stick out in a defensive position. Their hornsare so tough that they can even pierce the thickhide on the bottom of a monster's foot. They areoften used by hunters as a natural trap or as ameans to slow down or turn away pursuers.

brewhare.name: Brewhare
brewhare.description: This round rabbit may appear cute and fluffy,but its furry coat is actually made of mold.By allowing bacteria to grow on it, it gainsan increased amount of nutrition from its food.Simply keeping this rabbit on their person canferment a hunter's food for added nutritionalvalue. As they are clever creatures, they usuallyescape their captors after a period of time.

tricktoad.name: Tricktoad
tricktoad.description: A frog known primarily for its distinctive red fins.It can puff itself up with pheromones to float likea balloon. Not one to shy away from confrontation,it instead spreads its menacing fins in a show ofintimidation, even against much larger foes, thoughnot always wisely. This show sometimes has theopposite effect, instead attracting predators. Thus,some hunters use it as a decoy, hence the name.

cutterfly.name: Cutterfly
cutterfly.description: A dragonfly with a sharp red tail that releasespheromones when under threat. During mating season,it rubs its tail on various surfaces to spread thechemical secretion. This action often cuts throughfishing nets. As a result, Cutterflies are shroudedin superstition, particularly amongst fishermen.Breathing in the pheromone grants hunters increasedconcentration for a higher chance at critical hits.

gustcrab.name: Gustcrab
gustcrab.description: A terrestrial crab with mushrooms on its body.When attacked, it rustles its shell, causing themushrooms to expel spores, which it uses forprotection. It also feeds on insects that areattracted to fungi, forming a mutually beneficialrelationship. The eyeball-like mushrooms on itsback are extremely bitter and not suitable forconsumption.

altaroth.name: Altaroth
altaroth.description: Insects that widely inhabit many areas. They absorb fruit, musrooms, and honey, and then carry them back to their nest. Materials can thus be collected from their swollen abdomens, whose color is related to what they're carrying.

bnahabra.name: Bnahabra
bnahabra.description: Pervasive flying insects that attack invaders with paralyzing venom and lay eggs in carrion along with a fluid that hastens decomposition. It is best to kill them with poison so that their parts are left ripe for the carving.

bombadgy.name: Bombadgy
bombadgy.description: An omnivorous small monster with a distinct round shape. Its whole body courses with flammable gas, which it expels in defense when threatened. Once expelled, this gas has explosive properties. This trait has led to Bombadgy being used in combat by many crafty hunters throughout history.

bullfango.name: Bullfango
bullfango.description: Large, wild boars with a foul temper. Fertile and wide-ranging, they have been konwn to form large herds. They are so aggressive that they will attack other members of their own herd if they don't recognize them. Those without a particular reason to hunt them are better off keeping their distance.

felyne.name: Felyne
felyne.description: Bipedal creatures resembling cats, known for their light hair. Though usually docile, they will attack viciously if provoked. Naturally curious, some try to enter human society, and are often hired by the Guild to cook for and otherwise assist hunters.

gajau.name: Gajau
gajau.description: Vicious piscine creatures that form groups to defend their territory from intruders. Though primarily aquatic creatures, they have been known to chase their prey onto land, before wriggling back into the banks and into the water. Be sure not to venture too closely to their habitat!

gargwa.name: Gargwa
gargwa.description: Flightless bird wyverns with vestigial wings, known to inhabit the Shrine Ruins. Quite timid, Gargwa have been known to lay eggs when other creatures surprise them from behind. They are raised as livestock in numerous villages.

izuchi.name: Izuchi
izuchi.description: An omnivorous bird wyvern that has a characteristic scythe-shaped tail. It uses this tail to attack, but also to climb trees and chop down fruit. Most Izuchi fall into herds led by a Great Izuchi; in each herd, the two beset fighters are selected by the two best fighters are selected by the leader to help it hunt prey.

jagras.name: Jagras
jagras.description: A smaller monster that travels and hunts in packs. Its hide blends in with its forest environment, and it has characteristic spikes on its back. If you chase a few away, the rest will usually follow suit. They tend to keep their distance when large monsters enter their territory, but sometimes the entire group will attack if they feel particularly threatened.

kelbi.name: Kelbi
kelbi.description: Small herbivores known for their gentle demeanor and the medicinal properties of their horns. Those wishing to harvest a horn should aim for the head when attacking them.

melynx.name: Melynx
melynx.description: Bidepal creatures resembling cats, known for their dark hair. More curious than Felynes and possessed by kleptomania, Melynxes take what they steal back to their dens.

remobra.name: Remobra
remobra.description: Small but agile flying wyverns that seek out weakened creatures to attack. Often seen near elder dragons, they're considered a portent of disaster. Originally classified as flying wyverns, after further research they were reclassified as snake wyverns.

wroggi.name: Wroggi
wroggi.description: Small, carnivorous bird wyverns with poison-generating organs that run from their mouths to their throats. They run in packs, often led by a large alpha male. Lesser members of the order are fiercely loyal, and will eagerly lay down their lives to protect the alpha.

hunting_edge.name: Hunting Edge
hunting_edge.input: [ZL] + [X] While in mid-air, press [X] or [ZR] after a successful hit
hunting_edge.description: A forward leaping attack. After landing a hit, press [X] or [ZR] to follow up with Plunging Thrust or Charged Slash for an additional damage. This new move increases the mobility of Great Sword users significantly.

power_sheathe.name: Power Sheathe
power_sheathe.description: Power Sheathe increases your attack power for a short period of time as you sheathe the weapon. Since you'll be sheathing the weapon frequently, this move will come in handy in many situations.

soaring_kick.name: Soaring Kick
soaring_kick.description: Consumes 1 Wirebug gauge to jump kick the enemy. When successfully hit, it connects to a Plunging Thrust. Hitting this Plunging Thrust fills up your Spirit Gauge automatically for certain period of time. You can also perform a Spirit Helm Breaker after the jump kick by spending one level of Spirit Gauge.

serene_pose.name: Serene Pose
serene_pose.description: By activating the Serene Pose before getting hit by enemy's attack actives a counter attack. This consumes 2 gauges of Wirebug.

falling_shadow.name: Falling Shadow
falling_shadow.description: A forward leaping attack. A succsssful hit will lead into a Scaling Slash. You can also follow up with a Falling Bash to stun your enemies.

windmill.name: Windmill
windmill.description: Uses Wirebug to swing your blade around. You can nullified monster's attack at the beginning of this move. This consumes 2 gauges of Wirebug.

piercing_bind.name: Piercing Bind
piercing_bind.description: This move throws a kunai to the enemy that detonates after a certain period of time. You can increase the damage of the kunai's explosion by landing more attacks while the kunai is stuck on the enemy.

shrouded_vault.name: Shrouded Vault
shrouded_vault.description: Hurls you forward in a designated direction. Getting hit while in motion triggers a counter-attack. Since the reach of dual blades tends to be short, this move can compensate for that weakness by leaping toward the enemy quickly.

silkbind_spinning_bludgeon.name: Silkbind Spinning Bludgeon
silkbind_spinning_bludgeon.description: This move Leaps forward and unleashes a spinning attack. You could do something similar in previous Monster Hunter World while sliding down the slope but this time, you don't have to have slope to perform this.

impact_crater.name: Impact Crater
impact_crater.description: Jump straight up and dish out a devastating rising attack. The number of hits you'll land, the more damage you'll deal depends on how much you charge prior to activation.

slide_beat.name: Slide Beat
slide_beat.description: This move uses a Wirebug to propel you forward into a spinning attack. The final performance grants a status boosts. You'll be invulnerable to knockback effects while moving forward.

earthshaker.name: Earthshaker
earthshaker.description: Flings forth a blade, connects it to your weapon with Ironsilk, and transmits booming sonic attacks. By attaching the string to enemy's weakness such as its head, which can deal heavy damage.

twin_vine.name: Twin Vine
twin_vine.description: Jabs a kunai straight into the target and connects you to the enemy with the ironsilk. By pressing [ZR]+[B] while the kunai is attached to the target, you can quickly jump toward the enemy.

anchor_rage.name: Anchor Rage
anchor_rage.description: Taking enemy's attack with your shield while the Anchor Rage is active boosts your attack power. The more attacks you've received by your shield, the more attack boost you'll get.

hail_cutter.name: Hail Cutter
hail_cutter.description: Performs a Rising Slash and then an Overhead Smash. Each usage reduces the cooldown time for Wyvern's Fire.

guard_edge.name: Guard Edge
guard_edge.description: A well-timed guard regenerates your weapon's sharpness. You can follow up with various attack combos after guarding.

invincible_gambit.name: Invincible Gambit
invincible_gambit.description: Moves you forward while performing a spinning attack. You'll be immune to flinching or being knocked back while this move is active.

switch_charger.name: Switch Charger
switch_charger.description: Uses a Wirebug to launch you forward while quickly regenerating your Switch Gauge. Your Switch Gauge won't decrease for a short time after activating this move.

morphing_advance.name: Morphing Advance
morphing_advance.description: Uses a Wirebug to launch you forward while your charge blade changes to axe form. You'll be immune to knockback and stun while this move is active.

counter_peak_performance.name: Counter Peak Performance
counter_peak_performance.description: Stretches silk to the ground and protects you from the enemy's attack. When enemy's attack hit while your shield is ready, your phials fill to maximum.

herculean_draw.name: Herculean Draw
herculean_draw.description: Surge forward in a designated direction. This move boosts your attack power for a short period of time as well.

focus_shot.name: Focus Shot
focus_shot.description: Dodges backward and crouches. While crouching, your stamina rapidly regenerates. If timed right, you can nullify a monster's attack. Use the Left Stick to change the direction of dodging.

silkbind_vault.name: Silkbind Vault
silkbind_vault.description: It's a leaping attack & can be used in mid-air and follow up with a Jumping Slash, a Jumping Advancing Slash, or a mid-air evade.

recall_kinsect.name: Recall Kinsect
recall_kinsect.description: Dodges enemy's attack while calling back your Kinsect. The returning Kinsect performs spinning attacks that scatter healing extracts. Its stamina will fully recover once it gets back to its master.

silkbind_glide.name: Silkbind Glide
silkbind_glide.description: Surge forward quickly. By pressing [ZR], you can unleash a powerful close-range severing attack.

fanning_vault.name: Fanning Vault
fanning_vault.description: Uses a Wirebug to vault you forward. You can fire, reload, or fire a Wyvernblast directly below you while in mid-air.

free_silkbind_glide.name: Free Silkbind Glide
free_silkbind_glide.description: Uses a Wirebug to hurl you forward. By pressing [X]+[A] to follow up with a melee attack or press [Y] to follow up with a quick sheathe. Gives mobility to Heavy Bowgun users.

counter_shot.name: Counter Shot
counter_shot.description: Stretches out a web of silk and counters the enemy's attack. You can change the direction of your counter-attack so you can hit the opponent charging towards you.

throwing_kunai.name: Throwing Kunai
throwing_kunai.description: A standard throwing kunai.Flies straight and true.Allows for precise aiming.

large_barrel_bomb.name: Large Barrel Bomb
large_barrel_bomb.description: A powerful bomb triggeredby external physical impact.

shock_trap.name: Shock Trap
shock_trap.description: A trap that immobilizesa target. Use it to capturemonsters.

lifepowder.name: Lifepowder
lifepowder.description: Produces a cloud thatheals you anyone nearby.

whetstone.name: Whetstone
whetstone.description: A standard-sized whetstone.Use it to restore a weapon'ssharpness.

cleanser.name: Cleanser
cleanser.description: Immediately removes any foamor webbing on your body.

deodorant.name: Deodorant
deodorant.description: An item that cures Stench,hellfireblight, and blast-blight when thrown down.

bbq_spit.name: BBQ Spit
bbq_spit.description: Just what you need to cookmeat. A must-have item forany hungry hunter.

empty_phial.name: Empty Phial
empty_phial.description: A regular old empty phial.Nothing more, nothing less.

large_barrel.name: Large Barrel
large_barrel.description: A large, empty barrel.Combine with gunpowderto make it into a bomb.

trap_tool.name: Trap Tool
trap_tool.description: A must-have item for puttingtogether pitfall traps andother kinds of traps.

powercharm.name: Powercharm
powercharm.description: An amulet that strengthensattacks. Just carrying thisgives you demonic strength.

armorcharm.name: Armorcharm
armorcharm.description: An amulet that increasesdefense. Just carrying thismakes your skin stone hard.

normal_ammo_1.name: Normal Ammo 1
normal_ammo_1.description: Ammo for novices.Doesn't pack much oomph.Unlimited shots.

normal_ammo_3.name: Normal Ammo 3
normal_ammo_3.description: High-quality gunpowderammo. Single-shot, butfast and impactful.

pierce_ammo_1.name: Pierce Ammo 1
pierce_ammo_1.description: Armor-piercing ammothat deals multiple hitsto some monsters.

pierce_ammo_2.name: Pierce Ammo 2
pierce_ammo_2.description: High-grade armor-piercingammo. Deals more hitsthan Pierce Ammo 1.

spread_ammo_1.name: Spread Ammo 1
spread_ammo_1.description: Ammo made for close combat.What it lacks in range, itmakes up for in damage.

spread_ammo_2.name: Spread Ammo 2
spread_ammo_2.description: Ammo made for closecombat. Deals more hitsthan Spread Ammo 1.

spread_ammo_3.name: Spread Ammo 3
spread_ammo_3.description: Max-grade ammo madefor close combat. Dealsnumerous hits.

sticky_ammo_1.name: Sticky Ammo 1
sticky_ammo_1.description: Powerful pierce and burstammo. Headshots may stun.

sticky_ammo_2.name: Sticky Ammo 2
sticky_ammo_2.description: Very powerful pierce andburst ammo. Headshotsmay stun.

cluster_bomb_1.name: Cluster Bomb 1
cluster_bomb_1.description: Ammo that fragments intothree shells upon impact.Beware of friendly fire!

cluster_bomb_2.name: Cluster Bomb 2
cluster_bomb_2.description: Ammo that fragments intofour shells upon impact.Beware of friendly fire!

poison_ammo_1.name: Poison Ammo 1
poison_ammo_1.description: Poisons target, but mayrequire several shots.

poison_ammo_2.name: Poison Ammo 2
poison_ammo_2.description: Enhanced ammo that inflictspoison. Some targetsrequire multiple shots.

paralysis_ammo_1.name: Paralysis Ammo 1
paralysis_ammo_1.description: Paralyzes target, but mayrequire several shots.

paralysis_ammo_2.name: Paralysis Ammo 2
paralysis_ammo_2.description: Enhanced ammo that inflictsparalysis. Some targetsrequire multiple shots.

sleep_ammo_1.name: Sleep Ammo 1
sleep_ammo_1.description: Induces sleep, but mayrequire several shots.

sleep_ammo_2.name: Sleep Ammo 2
sleep_ammo_2.description: Enhanced ammo thatinflicts sleep. Some targetsrequire multiple shots.

exhaust_ammo_2.name: Exhaust Ammo 2
exhaust_ammo_2.description: Enhanced special ammothat drains a monster'sstamina.

recover_ammo_1.name: Recover Ammo 1
recover_ammo_1.description: Ammo that restores asmall amount of healthto an ally upon impact.

flaming_ammo.name: Flaming Ammo
flaming_ammo.description: Ammo that packs apunch against monstersweak to fire element.

water_ammo.name: Water Ammo
water_ammo.description: Ammo that packs apunch against monstersweak to water element.

thunder_ammo.name: Thunder Ammo
thunder_ammo.description: Ammo that packs apunch against monstersweak to thunder element.

freeze_ammo.name: Freeze Ammo
freeze_ammo.description: Ammo that packs apunch against monstersweak to ice element.

slicing_ammo.name: Slicing Ammo
slicing_ammo.description: Ammo that ejects sharpblades on impact, whichcan sever tails.

wyvern_ammo.name: Wyvern Ammo
wyvern_ammo.description: Ammo created throughyears of research intoWyvern's Fire.

tranq_ammo.name: Tranq Ammo
tranq_ammo.description: Bowgun ammo usedto capture monstersensnared in traps.

power_coating.name: Power Coating
power_coating.description: An arrow coating thatincreases the attackpower of arrows.

poison_coating.name: Poison Coating
poison_coating.description: An arrow coating thatapplies poison effectsto arrows.

para_coating.name: Para Coating
para_coating.description: An arrow coating thatapplies paralysis effectsto arrows.

sleep_coating.name: Sleep Coating
sleep_coating.description: An arrow coating thatapplies sleep effectsto arrows.

blast_coating.name: Blast Coating
blast_coating.description: An arrow coating thatapplies explosive powderto arrows.

close-range_coating.name: Close-range Coating
close-range_coating.description: Arrows that deal more damageto close targets, butreduces maximum range.

exhaust_coating.name: Exhaust Coating
exhaust_coating.description: An arrow coating thatapplies a fatigue-inducingfluid to arrows.

lottery_ticket.name: Lottery Ticket
lottery_ticket.description: This ticket can be redeemedfor a free turn at the lotteryduring Kagero's sales.

rathian_scale.name: Rathian Scale
rathian_scale.description: Scales of a Rathian. Theirdark emerald hue exudesa feminine grace.

rathian_shell.name: Rathian Shell
rathian_shell.description: A shell piece comprised oflayered scales, making itmuch harder than just one.

rathian_webbing.name: Rathian Webbing
rathian_webbing.description: This heat-resistantmaterial is oftenused as armor lining.

rathian_spike.name: Rathian Spike
rathian_spike.description: Needle-like hair found ona Rathian's back and wings.They contain poison.

rathian_plate.name: Rathian Plate
rathian_plate.description: A searing tail scale. Hardto come by and as fiery asthe wyvern it came from.

rathalos_scale.name: Rathalos Scale
rathalos_scale.description: A Rathalos scale. Wyvernscales like this one arefundamental materials.

rathalos_shell.name: Rathalos Shell
rathalos_shell.description: A shell piece comprised oflayered scales, making itmuch harder than just one.

rathalos_webbing.name: Rathalos Webbing
rathalos_webbing.description: This heat-resistantmaterial is oftenused as armor lining.

rathalos_plate.name: Rathalos Plate
rathalos_plate.description: A searing tail scale. Hardto come by and as fiery asthe wyvern it came from.

rathalos_marrow.name: Rathalos Marrow
rathalos_marrow.description: Recent advances allow thismarrow to be extracted. Itignites on air contact.

flame_sac.name: Flame Sac
flame_sac.description: A monster organ filled withflammable powder. Handlewith extreme care.

zinogre_shell.name: Zinogre Shell
zinogre_shell.description: A blue-green shell whichstores electricity and worksas a protective insulator.

zinogre_shockfur.name: Zinogre Shockfur
zinogre_shockfur.description: White fur that stores andmagnifies electricity, whichit holds even after carving.

zinogre_claw.name: Zinogre Claw
zinogre_claw.description: A sharp and tremendouslypowerful claw capable ofquickly dicing up prey.

zinogre_shocker.name: Zinogre Shocker
zinogre_shocker.description: The ocher shell that oncelined a Zinogre's body.Contains conductive lipids.

zinogre_plate.name: Zinogre Plate
zinogre_plate.description: A rare and intimidatingtrophy that seems to pulsewith residual fury.

mizutsune_scale.name: Mizutsune Scale
mizutsune_scale.description: A transparent Mizutsune scale.Its irregular shape refractslight into many bright colors.

mizutsune_purplefur.name: Mizutsune Purplefur
mizutsune_purplefur.description: The purple fur of a Mizutsune.Stiff, but is soft as silk whensoaked with bubblefoam.

mizutsune_claw.name: Mizutsune Claw
mizutsune_claw.description: A claw that flies freelythrough bubblefoam, allowingit to be used as a spike.

bubblefoam.name: Bubblefoam
bubblefoam.description: Fluid secreted by Mizutsune.Just a few drops can turn aswamp into a bubble bath.

mizutsune_plate.name: Mizutsune Plate
mizutsune_plate.description: An ancient scale as old asits former owner. Can evencreate rainbows from light.

aknosom_scale.name: Aknosom Scale
aknosom_scale.description: An Aknosom scale that glowswith a stunning ivory light.A popular material.

aknosom_feather.name: Aknosom Feather
aknosom_feather.description: Feathered Aknosom scaletreasured for its use inumbrellas. Sturdy yet light.

aknosom_crest.name: Aknosom Crest
aknosom_crest.description: An Aknosom comb. The eyeballmotif on the forehead showsup in many a ghost story.

tetranadon_hide.name: Tetranadon Hide
tetranadon_hide.description: Made from Tetranadon belly,it's very stretchy. Now youcan eat as much as you want!

tetra_carapace.name: Tetra Carapace
tetra_carapace.description: This shell's mossy surfaceacts as a cushion, making itsturdier than it looks.

tetranadon_beak.name: Tetranadon Beak
tetranadon_beak.description: You can store up water inthis Tetranadon beak. Greatfor gear that uses water.

almudron_scale.name: Almudron Scale
almudron_scale.description: Highly water-repellentAlmudron scale. Allows forunhindered bog traversal.

almudron_shell.name: Almudron Shell
almudron_shell.description: Overlapping scales fusedwith mud and Almudron mucusto form an outer shell.

almudron_claw.name: Almudron Claw
almudron_claw.description: Almudron claws thatexcel at speedy digging.Dirt fears them.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.description: Meat carved from a monster.You might catch a certainFlooded Forest fish with it.

pitfall_trap.name: Pitfall Trap
pitfall_trap.description: A trap for catching certainlarge monsters. It istripped by a heavy weight.

dango_ticket.name: Dango Ticket
dango_ticket.description: A ticket for dango fullof carefully selected,special ingredients.

honey.name: Honey
honey.description: Highly nutritious honey.Combine with potions to makethe more potent mega potion.

blue_mushroom.name: Blue Mushroom
blue_mushroom.description: A mushroom infused withpower-enhancing effects.Used in restorative items.

godbug.name: Godbug
godbug.description: An insect said to live a millennium.Combine it with other items to addtheir properties to the powder.

nulberry.name: Nulberry
nulberry.description: Mysterious berry that curesblights and resistance down.

latchberry.name: Latchberry
latchberry.description: A nut that bears a spiralgroove. Used to makePierce Ammo.

iron_ore.name: Iron Ore
iron_ore.description: Ore that can be smeltedinto metal and used formany different purposes.

earth_crystal.name: Earth Crystal
earth_crystal.description: Crystallized microbes whichare prized as an abrasivewhen forging weapons.

machalite_ore.name: Machalite Ore
machalite_ore.description: An ore that yields bettermetals than iron ore.Used to make machalite.

dragonite_ore.name: Dragonite Ore
dragonite_ore.description: An ore that yields metalsuperior to that ofmachalite—rare and valuable.

unique_mushroom.name: Unique Mushroom
unique_mushroom.description: A pinky-sized shroom valuedfor its unusual aroma.(Account Item)

choice_mushroom.name: Choice Mushroom
choice_mushroom.description: The perfect shape and aroma.Even better than a uniquemushroom. (Account Item)

energy_drink.name: Energy Drink
energy_drink.description: A Guild-approved beveragethat boosts your stamina.Helps shake off sleep, too!

shrapnel_ammo_1.name: Shrapnel Ammo 1
shrapnel_ammo_1.description: Ammo that covers a widearea. Who needs accuracywhen you hit this much?

shrapnel_ammo_2.name: Shrapnel Ammo 2
shrapnel_ammo_2.description: Ammo that covers a wide area.More range and even more hitsthan Shrapnel Ammo 1.

shrapnel_ammo_3.name: Shrapnel Ammo 3
shrapnel_ammo_3.description: Max-grade shrapnel ammo thatdelivers maximum range andhit-count over a wide area.

anjanath_pelt.name: Anjanath Pelt
anjanath_pelt.description: This Anjanath fur is usedby local firefighters for itsfire-resistant properties.

anjanath_scale.name: Anjanath Scale
anjanath_scale.description: Tempered by the heat of anAnjanath, this scale repelsany ordinary blade.

anjanath_fang.name: Anjanath Fang
anjanath_fang.description: Fang shaped by the extremepressure and heat of anAnjanath's mouth.

anjanath_nosebone.name: Anjanath Nosebone
anjanath_nosebone.description: Nasal bone of an Anjanath.Its characteristic structureis a hot research topic.

anjanath_tail.name: Anjanath Tail
anjanath_tail.description: This Anjanath tail can beused in weapons, but it'salso a local delicacy.

anjanath_plate.name: Anjanath Plate
anjanath_plate.description: Rare, roiled Anjanathplating, produced by thebeast's persistent rage.

armor_sphere.name: Armor Sphere
armor_sphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat.Fuse this to armor toimprove it by a tiny amount.

armor_sphere_plus.name: Armor Sphere+
armor_sphere_plus.description: Reacts uniquely to heat.Fuse this to armor toimprove it by a small amount.

advanced_armor_sphere.name: Advanced Armor Sphere
advanced_armor_sphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat.Fuse this to armor toimprove it.

sticky_ammo_3.name: Sticky Ammo 3
sticky_ammo_3.description: Powerful pierce and burstammo. Headshots stun.

cluster_bomb_3.name: Cluster Bomb 3
cluster_bomb_3.description: Ammo that fragments intofive shells upon impact.Beware of friendly fire!

recover_ammo_2.name: Recover Ammo 2
recover_ammo_2.description: Ammo that restores amoderate amount of healthto an ally upon impact.

demon_ammo.name: Demon Ammo
demon_ammo.description: Ammo that fills the targetwith savage amountsof strength.

armor_ammo.name: Armor Ammo
armor_ammo.description: Ammo that makes thetarget's skin as hardas stone.

piercing_fire_ammo.name: Piercing Fire Ammo
piercing_fire_ammo.description: Piercing ammo that dischargesmultiple heavy-hittingfire-element shots.

piercing_water_ammo.name: Piercing Water Ammo
piercing_water_ammo.description: Piercing ammo that dischargesmultiple heavy-hittingwater-element shots.

piercing_ice_ammo.name: Piercing Ice Ammo
piercing_ice_ammo.description: Piercing ammo that dischargesmultiple heavy-hittingice-element shots.

piercing_thunder_ammo.name: Piercing Thunder Ammo
piercing_thunder_ammo.description: Piercing ammo that dischargesmultiple heavy-hittingthunder-element shots.

dragon_ammo.name: Dragon Ammo
dragon_ammo.description: Ammo that packs a punchagainst monsters weak todragon element.

piercing_dragon_ammo.name: Piercing Dragon Ammo
piercing_dragon_ammo.description: Piercing ammo that dischargesmultiple heavy-hittingdragon-element shots.

flash_bomb.name: Flash Bomb
flash_bomb.description: Flashes brightly on impact.Toss this right under amonster's nose to blind it.

old_message.name: Old Message
old_message.description: An old message. Holdshistorical value and isthus sought by Kagero.

aknosom_beak.name: Aknosom Beak
aknosom_beak.description: Aknosom beak that appearsto be wearing lipstick. Usedin arts and crafts.

tetranadon_disc.name: Tetranadon Disc
tetranadon_disc.description: Disc-shaped bone thatprotects a Tetranadon'smoisturizing organ from foes.

somnacanth_scale.name: Somnacanth Scale
somnacanth_scale.description: Somnacanth scale thatglistens a brilliant yellowdue to its watery coating.

somnacanth_shell.name: Somnacanth Shell
somnacanth_shell.description: A spiked Somancanth carapacebuilt for protection andcutting through water.

somnacanth_talon.name: Somnacanth Talon
somnacanth_talon.description: A talon with a long, hookedshape that's great forweapons, but also farm work!

somnacanth_fin.name: Somnacanth Fin
somnacanth_fin.description: A Somnacanth head-fin. Asbeautiful as the midnightsea. Careful with the barbs!

somnacanth_dust.name: Somnacanth Dust
somnacanth_dust.description: A glimmering blue powdershot from a Somnacanth'sneck. Makes you feel sleepy.

magnamalo_scale.name: Magnamalo Scale
magnamalo_scale.description: Sturdy and small Magnamaloscale that is flexible andresistant to fangs.

magnamalo_shell.name: Magnamalo Shell
magnamalo_shell.description: An armor-like carapace fromMagnamalo. Won't budge toany run-of-the-mill strikes.

magnamalo_blade.name: Magnamalo Blade
magnamalo_blade.description: Talon that has grown into ablade shape on Magnamalo'sforearm. Already very sharp.

magnamalo_tail.name: Magnamalo Tail
magnamalo_tail.description: Magnamalo's bladed tail.Used to pierce through theguts of unsuspecting prey.

magnamalo_horn.name: Magnamalo Horn
magnamalo_horn.description: Majestic Magnamalo horn thatechoes with the sorrow ofwarriors slain.

magnamalo_scute.name: Magnamalo Scute
magnamalo_scute.description: Bladed hide of Magnamalo'sback. Its edge is nickedfrom countless battles.

magna_ghostprism.name: Magna Ghostprism
magna_ghostprism.description: A gaseous crystal that emitsflammable gas resemblingdancing purple flames.

magnamalo_plate.name: Magnamalo Plate
magnamalo_plate.description: Rare Magnamalo scale.Glows with a deep purple,all-consuming menace.

golden_muck.name: Golden Muck
golden_muck.description: Mud mixed with Almudronmucus. Prized for itsviscosity and sumptuous hue.

almudron_fin.name: Almudron Fin
almudron_fin.description: Red tuft of Almudron hair.Covered in a viscous fluidsecreted from its pores.

almudron_tail.name: Almudron Tail
almudron_tail.description: An impressive Almudron tail.Its willow-esque droop opensup opportunities to strike.

almudron_whisker.name: Almudron Whisker
almudron_whisker.description: These crimson Almudronwhiskers sense vibrationsto help locate prey.

almudron_plate.name: Almudron Plate
almudron_plate.description: Rare Almudron scale.As you stare into its grayhue, you feel sucked in.

goss_harag_fur.name: Goss Harag Fur
goss_harag_fur.description: This Goss hair repels snowand keeps heat in, makingit popular for winter wear.

goss_harag_hide.name: Goss Harag Hide
goss_harag_hide.description: The Goss Harag's warm bodyand the cold outside airhave tempered this hide.

goss_harag_brace.name: Goss Harag Brace
goss_harag_brace.description: Ice and snow have built upon this arm carapace untilit could work as a weapon.

goss_harag_horn.name: Goss Harag Horn
goss_harag_horn.description: Lumpy blue horns of a GossHarag. For some reason, theytend to scare children.

goss_harag_claw.name: Goss Harag Claw
goss_harag_claw.description: Goss Harag claws. They grownot only from its toes,but also all over its feet!

block_of_ice.name: Block of Ice
block_of_ice.description: The Goss Harag melts snow onits body, forming this iceclump on its legs at will.

goss_harag_bile.name: Goss Harag Bile
goss_harag_bile.description: A Goss Harag gallbladderonce prized as a panacea.Good luck getting it out...

arzuros_pelt.name: Arzuros Pelt
arzuros_pelt.description: An Arzuros pelt. The whiteportion is soft, while theblue is short and taut.

arzuros_pelt_plus.name: Arzuros Pelt+
arzuros_pelt_plus.description: A splendid Arzuros pelt.Sturdy enough to survive inharsh mountainous terrain.

arzuros_shell.name: Arzuros Shell
arzuros_shell.description: Shell from an Arzuros's heador back. Bends willinglyand is easy to forge.

arzuros_carapace.name: Arzuros Carapace
arzuros_carapace.description: A quality Arzuros carapace.The thick shell can endurebites from ordinary fangs.

arzuros_brace.name: Arzuros Brace
arzuros_brace.description: A brace from an Arzuros'sforelegs. Its sharp points giveforged equipment a wild flavor.

arzuros_brace_plus.name: Arzuros Brace+
arzuros_brace_plus.description: A strong Arzuros brace.Its thorn-like protrusionsmake paw swipes deadly.

great_baggi_hide.name: Great Baggi Hide
great_baggi_hide.description: Hide from a Great Baggi.Despite how tough it is,it's covered in old scars.

great_baggi_hide_plus.name: Great Baggi Hide+
great_baggi_hide_plus.description: Quality Great Baggi hide.You'd be hard pressed tohurt a Baggi this tough.

great_baggi_claw.name: Great Baggi Claw
great_baggi_claw.description: A robust Great Baggi claw.It's thicker than a regularold Baggi claw.

great_baggi_claw_plus.name: Great Baggi Claw+
great_baggi_claw_plus.description: A quality Great Baggi Claw.Sharpened by battle, it'sperfect for weapons.

lagombi_pelt.name: Lagombi Pelt
lagombi_pelt.description: A white pelt carved from aLagombi. One pat and you'llbe hooked on its fluffy fur.

lagombi_pelt_plus.name: Lagombi Pelt+
lagombi_pelt_plus.description: Quality white Lagombi pelt.Its frosty shine makes ita sought-after luxury item.

lagombi_ear.name: Lagombi Ear
lagombi_ear.description: The long ear of a Lagombi.A lifetime in the cold hasmade it hard as a shell.

lagombi_ear_plus.name: Lagombi Ear+
lagombi_ear_plus.description: An impressive Lagombi ear.Highly developed, it can besharp as steel if polished.

lagombi_plastron.name: Lagombi Plastron
lagombi_plastron.description: Shell piece from a Lagombi'sbelly. Its ridges allow theLagombi to slide on ice.

lagombi_plastron_plus.name: Lagombi Plastron+
lagombi_plastron_plus.description: A strong, sticky, and thickLagombi Plastron. Usedto make superior equipment.

lagombi_iceclaw.name: Lagombi Iceclaw
lagombi_iceclaw.description: A Lagombi claw that's coldto the touch. Permanentlycovered in ice.

lagombi_frozenclaw.name: Lagombi Frozenclaw
lagombi_frozenclaw.description: A Lagombi claw surrounded bycold air. Wounds it causesfreeze over in an instant.

flabby_hide.name: Flabby Hide
flabby_hide.description: Now useable as a materialthanks to recent advances.Has mysterious properties.

pearl_hide.name: Pearl Hide
pearl_hide.description: The hide of a Khezu.Its strange properties arestill not fully understood.

pale_extract.name: Pale Extract
pale_extract.description: Has the ability to amplifythe effects of certainmedicines.

pale_bone.name: Pale Bone
pale_bone.description: The rib bone from a Khezu.Still has chunks of meatattached.

pale_steak.name: Pale Steak
pale_steak.description: Fatty meat from aKhezu. Looks tasty,but cannot be eaten.

barroth_shell.name: Barroth Shell
barroth_shell.description: Shell from a Barroth. It'spretty muddy, but that'swhy it's so strong.

barroth_carapace.name: Barroth Carapace
barroth_carapace.description: A Barroth's carapace coatedin multiple layers of mud,making it quite rigid.

barroth_ridge.name: Barroth Ridge
barroth_ridge.description: Plate taken from a Barroth'sback. Fairly rare, but makesfor quality material.

barroth_ridge_plus.name: Barroth Ridge+
barroth_ridge_plus.description: A thick, sturdy part of a Barrothbackplate. Mud and sunlighthave helped to harden it further.

barroth_claw.name: Barroth Claw
barroth_claw.description: A Barroth claw. It's nottoo sharp, but can be usedto strengthen many things.

barroth_claw_plus.name: Barroth Claw+
barroth_claw_plus.description: A polished claw sharpened bysand and dirt. It can dig througheven the toughest earth.

barroth_scalp.name: Barroth Scalp
barroth_scalp.description: This durable part of aBarroth's skull is also thehardest to remove.

barroth_tail.name: Barroth Tail
barroth_tail.description: Barroth tails aren't veryvaluable, but the meat ishailed as a delicacy.

fertile_mud.name: Fertile Mud
fertile_mud.description: Mud that Barroth roll aroundin. Nutrient-rich and greatfor farming.

great_wroggi_hide.name: Great Wroggi Hide
great_wroggi_hide.description: Hide from a Great Wroggi.The white-on-orange patternalmost looks dyed.

great_wroggi_hide_plus.name: Great Wroggi Hide+
great_wroggi_hide_plus.description: Quality Great Wroggi hide.The colors would look greaton an expert's weapon.

great_wroggi_brace.name: Great Wroggi Brace
great_wroggi_brace.description: A brace from a Great Wroggi.Covered in scales, it alsoincludes claws and plate.

great_wroggi_brace_plus.name: Great Wroggi Brace+
great_wroggi_brace_plus.description: A tough Great Wroggi bracecomprised of high-qualityplate and claws.

kings_beak.name: King's Beak
kings_beak.description: A beak from a Great Wroggi.Careful with it—it's still poisonous!

spongy_hide.name: Spongy Hide
spongy_hide.description: Spongin from a Royal Ludroth'smane. Valued for its elasticityand high water retention.

spongy_hide_plus.name: Spongy Hide+
spongy_hide_plus.description: High-grade elastic hide thatboasts a remarkable abilityto retain water.

royal_ludroth_scale.name: Royal Ludroth Scale
royal_ludroth_scale.description: A small scale that enablesgraceful movement. You needseveral to forge equipment.

royal_ludroth_scale_plus.name: Royal Ludroth Scale+
royal_ludroth_scale_plus.description: A large, strong scale froma Royal Ludroth. It reflectslight in every direction.

royal_ludroth_claw.name: Royal Ludroth Claw
royal_ludroth_claw.description: A claw from a Royal Ludroth.Adapted better to movementthan to attacking.

royal_ludroth_claw_plus.name: Royal Ludroth Claw+
royal_ludroth_claw_plus.description: A sharp, pointed Royal Ludrothclaw. It plunges deep into theearth with each step taken.

royal_ludroth_crest.name: Royal Ludroth Crest
royal_ludroth_crest.description: These crests become rigidwhen the beast is angry;quantity indicates status.

royal_ludroth_crest_plus.name: Royal Ludroth Crest+
royal_ludroth_crest_plus.description: A proud, strong crest befittinga pack leader. Its sharp hornsshine magnificently.

royal_ludroth_tail.name: Royal Ludroth Tail
royal_ludroth_tail.description: The finned tail of a RoyalLudroth, used by fishermenfor their boats.

barioth_shell.name: Barioth Shell
barioth_shell.description: White shell from aBarioth. It's strong yetincredibly light.

barioth_carapace.name: Barioth Carapace
barioth_carapace.description: A Barioth carapace with animpressive shine. Stronglyresembles an ice floe.

barioth_pelt.name: Barioth Pelt
barioth_pelt.description: A white pelt that's soft tothe touch. Absorbs impactalmost as well as a Barioth.

barioth_pelt_plus.name: Barioth Pelt+
barioth_pelt_plus.description: A high-quality white pelt witha lovely texture. Nobles useit as a symbol of authority.

barioth_claw.name: Barioth Claw
barioth_claw.description: A deceptively sharp Bariothclaw that can carve throughthick glaciers.

barioth_claw_plus.name: Barioth Claw+
barioth_claw_plus.description: A claw honed in the harsh Tundraenvironment. It can take downprey with a single swipe.

barioth_spike.name: Barioth Spike
barioth_spike.description: These come in many sizes,and assist the Barioth inclinging to walls of ice.

barioth_tail.name: Barioth Tail
barioth_tail.description: Barioth tails are covered inhard plate, and surprisinglytough to sever.

amber_fang.name: Amber Fang
amber_fang.description: A fang from a Barioth. Canbe used for weapons, butalso for decoration.

amber_fang_plus.name: Amber Fang+
amber_fang_plus.description: Amber tusks sharpened bycountless kills. Can smashthrough gigantic ice blocks.

volvidon_shell.name: Volvidon Shell
volvidon_shell.description: The heat-resistant shell ofa Volvidon. Unaffected evenby boiling lava.

volvi_carapace.name: Volvi Carapace
volvi_carapace.description: A thick Volvidon carapace.The elasticity means forgingit requires severe pressure.

volvidon_claw.name: Volvidon Claw
volvidon_claw.description: A claw from a Volvidon'sforeleg. Dramatically raisesthe power of a wide swing.

volvidon_claw_plus.name: Volvidon Claw+
volvidon_claw_plus.description: A hard, sharp Volvidon claw.Constant exposure to heathas tempered it like steel.

volvi_rickrack.name: Volvi Rickrack
volvi_rickrack.description: The jagged shell of a Volvidon'sback. Its high elasticity makes itideal for crafting flexible gear.

basarios_shell.name: Basarios Shell
basarios_shell.description: Rock-hard Basariosshell. Can be usedto refine metals.

basarios_carapace.name: Basarios Carapace
basarios_carapace.description: A rigid Basarios shell. Theamount of ore in it makes itcloser to rock than shell.

basarios_wing.name: Basarios Wing
basarios_wing.description: The wing of a Basarios.Very hard to work asa material.

basarios_tears.name: Basarios Tears
basarios_tears.description: Faintly pink gems foundnear the tear ductsof a Basarios.

nargacuga_scale.name: Nargacuga Scale
nargacuga_scale.description: A scale from a Nargacuga.The surface is covered withthe beast's black fur.

nargacuga_scale_plus.name: Nargacuga Scale+
nargacuga_scale_plus.description: A black Nargacuga scale.Despite its hardness, it'ssurprisingly light and smooth.

nargacuga_blackfur.name: Nargacuga Blackfur
nargacuga_blackfur.description: Black fur that grows onscales. Covers the animalin jet-black darkness.

nargacuga_pelt_plus.name: Nargacuga Pelt+
nargacuga_pelt_plus.description: Pitch-black fur from aNargacuga. It absorbs lightand emits pure darkness.

nargacuga_tail.name: Nargacuga Tail
nargacuga_tail.description: A Nargacuga's impressive tail.Might be mistaken for a weaponif seen out of context.

narga_tailspike.name: Narga Tailspike
narga_tailspike.description: A spiky scale from a Nargacugatail. It stands up when thebeast is enraged.

nargacuga_cutwing.name: Nargacuga Cutwing
nargacuga_cutwing.description: Blade-like Nargacuga wing.Evolved to cut down preyon the fly.

narga_razor.name: Narga Razor
narga_razor.description: The large, sharp bladewingof a Nargacuga. It can slicethrough foes in a flash.

nargacuga_fang.name: Nargacuga Fang
nargacuga_fang.description: Although small, the jaggedplacement of these fangsaids their cutting ability.

nargacuga_fang_plus.name: Nargacuga Fang+
nargacuga_fang_plus.description: A Nargacuga's terribly sharpfang. Evolved to tear ratherthan chew.

nargacuga_marrow.name: Nargacuga Marrow
nargacuga_marrow.description: Marrow as nimble as theNargacuga itself; requirestalent to properly harvest.

narga_medulla.name: Narga Medulla
narga_medulla.description: A Nargacuga's medulla. Merelytouching it causes extreme pain,making crafting quite difficult.

rathian_scale_plus.name: Rathian Scale+
rathian_scale_plus.description: A superior Rathian scale.Looks like a normal Rathianscale, but is much harder.

rathian_carapace.name: Rathian Carapace
rathian_carapace.description: Rathian shell prized for itslavish green coloration. Anexcellent armor material.

rathian_spike_plus.name: Rathian Spike+
rathian_spike_plus.description: As sharp as the keenestblade. It is longer andsturdier than other spikes.

rathian_ruby.name: Rathian Ruby
rathian_ruby.description: A rare, precious gem frominside a wyvern. Almosttoo nice to use.

zinogre_carapace.name: Zinogre Carapace
zinogre_carapace.description: The carapace of a Zinogre.Its magnificence reveals thefutility of facing it.

zinogre_electrofur.name: Zinogre Electrofur
zinogre_electrofur.description: Zinogre fur said to storelots of electricity. Shineswhite from the charge.

zinogre_horn_plus.name: Zinogre Horn+
zinogre_horn_plus.description: A pointed Zinogre horn. Whencarved, it grants equipmentincomparable power.

zinogre_claw_plus.name: Zinogre Claw+
zinogre_claw_plus.description: A high voltage Zinogreclaw. Its electrifiedattacks are truly brutal.

zinogre_shocker_plus.name: Zinogre Shocker+
zinogre_shocker_plus.description: An electrically chargedZinogre shell. Grants athunder god's power to gear.

zinogre_jasper.name: Zinogre Jasper
zinogre_jasper.description: A rare gem sometimes producedinside a Zinogre's body. Thebeast's power swells within.

mizutsune_scale_plus.name: Mizutsune Scale+
mizutsune_scale_plus.description: A quality Mizutsune scale.Older scales polished overtime can be very valuable.

mizutsune_purplefur_plus.name: Mizutsune Purplefur+
mizutsune_purplefur_plus.description: High-quality purple fur.More foam-absorbent thanits lighter counterpart.

mizutsune_claw_plus.name: Mizutsune Claw+
mizutsune_claw_plus.description: Friction-reducing bubblefoamhelps this deadly claw slicethrough prey like sushi.

mizutsune_fin_plus.name: Mizutsune Fin+
mizutsune_fin_plus.description: A high-quality fin. Bubble-foam gives it an elegantpattern prettier than dye.

bubblefoam_plus.name: Bubblefoam+
bubblefoam_plus.description: The top layer of Mizutsunefluid. Removes impuritiesand is used in many rituals.

mizutsune_water_orb.name: Mizutsune Water Orb
mizutsune_water_orb.description: A multicolored orb formedfrom a crystalized Mizutsunescale and bubblefoam.

rathalos_scale_plus.name: Rathalos Scale+
rathalos_scale_plus.description: An extraordinarily durablescale carved from the bodyof a Rathalos.

rathalos_carapace.name: Rathalos Carapace
rathalos_carapace.description: This Rathalos shell emanatesa nobility befittingthe ruler of the skies.

rathalos_wing.name: Rathalos Wing
rathalos_wing.description: A wing from a Rathalos.Skilled artisans can craftit into strong equipment.

rathalos_ruby.name: Rathalos Ruby
rathalos_ruby.description: A rare, precious gem frominside a wyvern. Almosttoo nice to use.

twisted_horn.name: Twisted Horn
twisted_horn.description: A twisted Diablos horn.Used in this region for many(less twisted) purposes.

majestic_horn.name: Majestic Horn
majestic_horn.description: A twisted Diablos horn ingreat shape. Use it to makemore powerful weapons.

diablos_shell.name: Diablos Shell
diablos_shell.description: Shell from a Diablos. It'sincredibly dense, and muchheavier than it looks.

diablos_carapace.name: Diablos Carapace
diablos_carapace.description: A quality Diablos carapace,buffed and hardened byconstant exposure to sand.

diablos_ridge.name: Diablos Ridge
diablos_ridge.description: A rigid Diablos backplate.Can be carved into fine gearwith the right knife skills.

diablos_ridge_plus.name: Diablos Ridge+
diablos_ridge_plus.description: A particularly thick, hardDiablos carapace. Sturdy,but a pain to carve off.

diablos_tailcase.name: Diablos Tailcase
diablos_tailcase.description: An armored tailcase thatputs iron hammers to shame.This material is a keeper.

diablos_fang.name: Diablos Fang
diablos_fang.description: A large, sturdy fang used ineverything from weaponsto ornaments.

diablos_marrow.name: Diablos Marrow
diablos_marrow.description: Diablos bone marrow.Recently discovered to havesuperb binding properties.

diablos_medulla.name: Diablos Medulla
diablos_medulla.description: A rare medulla. Difficultto remove, but of greatinterest to researchers.

tigrex_scale.name: Tigrex Scale
tigrex_scale.description: Scale from the incrediblyviolent Tigrex. Incrediblymassive and sturdy.

tigrex_scale_plus.name: Tigrex Scale+
tigrex_scale_plus.description: A flawless Tigrex scale. Canbe fastened with others tobecome harder than steel.

tigrex_shell.name: Tigrex Shell
tigrex_shell.description: A hard Tigrex shellcapable of repelling anyimpact. Extreme tenacity.

tigrex_carapace.name: Tigrex Carapace
tigrex_carapace.description: A material hardened by thesands of time. Sharp edgesshow the Tigrex's ferocity.

tigrex_tail.name: Tigrex Tail
tigrex_tail.description: This flexible and strongtail can make greatequipment.

tigrex_claw.name: Tigrex Claw
tigrex_claw.description: A vicious foreclaw unique tothe Tigrex. Known for itsinsidious biting edge.

tigrex_claw_plus.name: Tigrex Claw+
tigrex_claw_plus.description: A claw that time hassharpened into a horribledeath sentence for prey.

tigrex_fang.name: Tigrex Fang
tigrex_fang.description: A terrifying fang used tocrush prey. Makes all whosee it quiver in fear.

tigrex_fang_plus.name: Tigrex Fang+
tigrex_fang_plus.description: The sharp fang of aTigrex. These fangs cancut any prey to shreds.

tigrex_scalp.name: Tigrex Scalp
tigrex_scalp.description: Part of the head of aTigrex. Looks terrifying, asif it is still alive.

tigrex_maw.name: Tigrex Maw
tigrex_maw.description: The awe-inspiring jaws ofa Tigrex, ready to crushboth bone and spirit.

rajang_horn_plus.name: Rajang Horn+
rajang_horn_plus.description: The majestic golden horn ofa Rajang. Hunters yearn forthe heroism it represents.

rajang_fang_plus.name: Rajang Fang+
rajang_fang_plus.description: This sharpened fang cancut through anything dumbenough to touch it.

rajang_blackfur.name: Rajang Blackfur
rajang_blackfur.description: Black Rajang fur. Whencrafted, the resulting clothis desired even by royalty.

rajang_claw_plus.name: Rajang Claw+
rajang_claw_plus.description: A sharp Rajang claw.Difficult to carve andmore difficult to craft.

rajang_tail.name: Rajang Tail
rajang_tail.description: The glistening tail of aRajang. The golden fur isbeautiful and elegant.

gold_rajang_pelt.name: Gold Rajang Pelt
gold_rajang_pelt.description: Fur taken from a Rajang'sbody. The golden hair istreasured by tailors.

kelbi_horn.name: Kelbi Horn
kelbi_horn.description: While unfit for forging,Kelbi horns are a vitalcomponent of many items.

anteka_antler.name: Anteka Antler
anteka_antler.description: An antler often used as rawmaterial for armor. Popularwith interior decorators.

rhenoplos_shell.name: Rhenoplos Shell
rhenoplos_shell.description: A shell that is very strongdespite coming from sucha small monster.

rhenoplos_carapace.name: Rhenoplos Carapace
rhenoplos_carapace.description: A carapace grown thick andhard over many years. Superstrong for a small monster.

rhenoplos_scalp.name: Rhenoplos Scalp
rhenoplos_scalp.description: A sturdy part of the skullthat yields, shall we say,dashing results?

slagtoth_hide.name: Slagtoth Hide
slagtoth_hide.description: A Slagtoth hide. It's prettysaggy, helping them evadedeadly attacks.

slagtoth_hide_plus.name: Slagtoth Hide+
slagtoth_hide_plus.description: Lustrous hide often cut intolarge slabs. Prized for itswater-resistant properties.

gargwa_feather.name: Gargwa Feather
gargwa_feather.description: A big, beautiful featherplucked from a Gargwa. Oftenused as a fashion accessory.

bnahabra_shell.name: Bnahabra Shell
bnahabra_shell.description: Just as useful as sturdywyvern shell in the handsof a clever craftsman.

bnahabra_carapace.name: Bnahabra Carapace
bnahabra_carapace.description: The hardest part of theshell. Reveals curiousproperties when forged.

bnahabra_wing.name: Bnahabra Wing
bnahabra_wing.description: Difficult to forge with—the results vary dependingon which surface you use.

bnahabra_stinger.name: Bnahabra Stinger
bnahabra_stinger.description: A Bnahabra stinger. It'sactually a hollow tube thathouses paralytic secretions.

altaroth_jaw.name: Altaroth Jaw
altaroth_jaw.description: Removing these mouthpartsrequires a deft hand.

altaroth_stomach.name: Altaroth Stomach
altaroth_stomach.description: A transparent sac cut froman Altaroth's abdomen, usedto store who knows what.

quality_stomach.name: Quality Stomach
quality_stomach.description: A high-quality sac from anAltaroth's abdomen. It'sthin, but durable.

bullfango_pelt.name: Bullfango Pelt
bullfango_pelt.description: A pelt from a Bullfango,covered in bristly fur.

bullfango_pelt_plus.name: Bullfango Pelt+
bullfango_pelt_plus.description: A high-quality pelt from aBullfango. It's as tough asit is bristly.

bullfango_head.name: Bullfango Head
bullfango_head.description: A Bullfango head, completewith two splendid tusks.

gajau_skin.name: Gajau Skin
gajau_skin.description: Gajau skin known for itsslimy mucus layer. Highlywater-resistant.

gajau_whisker.name: Gajau Whisker
gajau_whisker.description: Gajau whiskers often used inaquatic gear as theyresist water.

gajau_scale.name: Gajau Scale
gajau_scale.description: High-quality Gajau skin.Thick and hard to work with,but it's worth the effort.

gajau_whisker_plus.name: Gajau Whisker+
gajau_whisker_plus.description: High-quality Gajau whiskers.They're so girthy, you coulduse them for fishing line.

jaggi_scale.name: Jaggi Scale
jaggi_scale.description: A scale carved from a Jaggi.Popular among hunters forits beauty and versatility.

jaggi_scale_plus.name: Jaggi Scale+
jaggi_scale_plus.description: A vividly-colored superiorJaggi scale that can be usedto make hardier equipment.

jaggi_hide.name: Jaggi Hide
jaggi_hide.description: Hide from under a Jaggi'sscales. Cheap, easy to workwith, and has numerous uses.

baggi_hide.name: Baggi Hide
baggi_hide.description: Smooth hide from under aBaggi's scales. Perfect forlife in tough environments.

baggi_scale.name: Baggi Scale
baggi_scale.description: A scale from a Baggi.A little tougher thana Jaggi scale.

baggi_scale_plus.name: Baggi Scale+
baggi_scale_plus.description: A quality scale taken froma Baggi. Important forstrengthening weapons.

wroggi_scale.name: Wroggi Scale
wroggi_scale.description: A scale from a Wroggi. Itsvivid color warns predatorsof its venomous properties.

wroggi_scale_plus.name: Wroggi Scale+
wroggi_scale_plus.description: A quality Wroggi scale. Thethickness shows this Wroggilived a long life.

wroggi_hide.name: Wroggi Hide
wroggi_hide.description: Hide from a Wroggi. Youcould make some really niceorange leather with this.

wroggi_fang.name: Wroggi Fang
wroggi_fang.description: A poisonous Wroggi fang.Still covered in poison thatcould fell huge monsters.

kestodon_shell.name: Kestodon Shell
kestodon_shell.description: This Kestodon shell's craggytexture helps to fend offattackers.

kestodon_scalp.name: Kestodon Scalp
kestodon_scalp.description: A Kestodon cranial carapace.Get slammed by this andyou're in for a bad time.

kestodon_carapace.name: Kestodon Carapace
kestodon_carapace.description: This sturdy Kestodon shellhas grown unusually thick.Feels a bit like a rock.

hydro_hide.name: Hydro Hide
hydro_hide.description: Hide that is very resistantto water. Don't expect it tosell for much.

hydro_hide_plus.name: Hydro Hide+
hydro_hide_plus.description: The durable hide of an aquaticmonster. Highly Water-resistant,and in especially good shape.

immature_sponge.name: Immature Sponge
immature_sponge.description: Ludroth sponge that's notfully developed. Popular formany uses besides forging.

uroktor_scale.name: Uroktor Scale
uroktor_scale.description: A volcanic monster's scale.Highly resistant to fire,but doesn't sell for much.

uroktor_scale_plus.name: Uroktor Scale+
uroktor_scale_plus.description: A high-quality Uroktor scale.Heat-resistant, bright crimson,and popular with the ladies.

big_fin.name: Big Fin
big_fin.description: A fin that can be all shapesand sizes. The strongest comefrom the Sandy Plains Delex.

quality_fin.name: Quality Fin
quality_fin.description: A beautiful, unmarred fin.Its perfection lends it bothstrength and high value.

meaty_hide.name: Meaty Hide
meaty_hide.description: The hide from the underbellyof a Zamite. Super elastic—just try stretching it.

meaty_hide_plus.name: Meaty Hide+
meaty_hide_plus.description: The hide from the underbellyof a Zamite. The mostelastic samples are costly.

sharqskin_scale.name: Sharqskin Scale
sharqskin_scale.description: Zamite skin that feelssmooth or coarse dependingon which way you rub it.

remobra_hide.name: Remobra Hide
remobra_hide.description: A glossy and subdued blackhide taken from a Remobra.

remobra_hide_plus.name: Remobra Hide+
remobra_hide_plus.description: A lustrous and elegant blackhide taken from a Remobra.

striped_hide.name: Striped Hide
striped_hide.description: Unassuming black-and-redhues from a Remobrathat some hunters swear by.

remobra_head.name: Remobra Head
remobra_head.description: The snake-like head of aRemobra. It stilllooks ready to pounce!

jagras_scale.name: Jagras Scale
jagras_scale.description: Scale harvested from aJagras. Famous for its vividhue and ease of handling.

jagras_hide.name: Jagras Hide
jagras_hide.description: This Jagras skin is easy towork with, making it a greatchoice for novice craftsmen.

jagras_scale_plus.name: Jagras Scale+
jagras_scale_plus.description: Precious scale taken from aJagras. Great for everythingfrom armor to jewelry.

jagras_hide_plus.name: Jagras Hide+
jagras_hide_plus.description: High-quality Jagras skin.Thicker, smoother, but stilljust as easy to work with.

monster_bone_s.name: Monster Bone S
monster_bone_s.description: A very useful material;indispensable for bothhunting and daily life.

monster_bone_m.name: Monster Bone M
monster_bone_m.description: A nicely-sized bone. Strongyet flexible, it's as reliableas steel and wood.

monster_bone_l.name: Monster Bone L
monster_bone_l.description: Bone from a large monster.Its size is hard to work withbut vital to craft big items.

monster_bone_plus.name: Monster Bone+
monster_bone_plus.description: A high-quality monster bone.Hard to obtain, but vital tocraft powerful equipment.

monster_keenbone.name: Monster Keenbone
monster_keenbone.description: A rare bone with a razor-sharp tip that retains itsstrength even when crafted.

monster_hardbone.name: Monster Hardbone
monster_hardbone.description: A precious bone rarelyyielded by wyverns. Hard toforge but incredibly strong.

elder_dragon_bone.name: Elder Dragon Bone
elder_dragon_bone.description: A bone from an elder dragon.It exudes majesty.

jumbo_bone.name: Jumbo Bone
jumbo_bone.description: A large, thick bone.Often cut apart in workshopsfor use in crafting.

stoutbone.name: Stoutbone
stoutbone.description: The large, sturdy bone of abeast. Prized by blacksmithsas a prime forging material.

bird_wyvern_gem.name: Bird Wyvern Gem
bird_wyvern_gem.description: A valuable gem that can beharvested from bird wyverns. Saidto fetch a high price on the market.

wyvern_gem.name: Wyvern Gem
wyvern_gem.description: Throughout a wyvern's life,impurities gather and formthis peculiar gem.

sharp_claw.name: Sharp Claw
sharp_claw.description: A shining black claw.Unlike wyvern claws, thisis shaped to grip objects.

sharp_fang.name: Sharp Fang
sharp_fang.description: Fangs come in many shapesand sizes—the right fangfor the right job.

piercing_claw.name: Piercing Claw
piercing_claw.description: Dangerous to touch withbare hands, it's used asa knife in some workshops.

warm_pelt.name: Warm Pelt
warm_pelt.description: A pelt from a small animal.Used for many things, butmostly just regular clothes.

high-quality_pelt.name: High-quality Pelt
high-quality_pelt.description: Feels wonderful to thetouch. Difficult to carvebut valued by the Guild.

elder_dragon_blood.name: Elder Dragon Blood
elder_dragon_blood.description: Contains an unknown compound.The object of much scholarlyresearch.

screamer_sac.name: Screamer Sac
screamer_sac.description: A monster organ that emitsan earsplitting sonic blastwhen ruptured.

poison_sac.name: Poison Sac
poison_sac.description: A monster organ thatcontains a lethal toxin.Handle with extreme care.

toxin_sac.name: Toxin Sac
toxin_sac.description: A monster organ filled withan extremely potent toxin.Even one touch can be risky.

omniplegia_sac.name: Omniplegia Sac

firebeetle.description: A beetle that rolls up lava rocksinto balls. Throw the ball toengulf a target in flames.

thunderbeetle.name: Thunderbeetle
thunderbeetle.description: A beetle that rolls up mudcontaining thunder-infusedmonster hair into balls. ZAP!

snowbeetle.name: Snowbeetle
snowbeetle.description: A beetle that rolls up snow intoice balls. Not recommendedfor a friendly snowball fight.

trapbugs.name: Trapbugs
trapbugs.description: Insects with sharp horns.A monster that tramplesthem will flee temporarily.

lanternbug.name: Lanternbug
lanternbug.description: A glowing caterpillar thatexplodes when hit, dealinga fixed amount of damage.

brewhare.name: Brewhare
brewhare.description: A moss-covered rabbit. Canbe used to improve theeffects of some items.

antidobra.name: Antidobra
antidobra.description: A snake that shoots a poisonantidote. Can be used tocure and prevent poison.

sleeptoad.name: Sleeptoad
sleeptoad.description: A frog that discharges asleep-inducing gas, sendingfoes straight to dreamland.

poisontoad.name: Poisontoad
poisontoad.description: A frog that dischargesa poisonous gas.

blastoad.name: Blastoad
blastoad.description: A frog that dischargesa combustible gasguaranteed to be a blast!

spiribird.name: Spiribird
spiribird.description: A tiny, softly glowing bird.The aroma of the pollen onits body grants a boon.

golden_spiribug.name: Golden Spiribug
golden_spiribug.description: A golden insect.Restores some stamina whenpicked up and can be stored.

gilded_spiribug.name: Gilded Spiribug
gilded_spiribug.description: A honey-gold insect.Restores some stamina whenpicked up and can be stored.

gustcrab.name: Gustcrab
gustcrab.description: A crab that shares symbiosiswith fungi. Creates guststhat can propel you upwards.
